means: 为小事操心，吹毛求疵( niggle的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: She had niggling doubts about their relationship.
sentence.Network_cn: 她时常对他们的关系有一丝疑虑。

sentence.Network_en: The matter is too small to be worth niggling over.
sentence.Network_cn: 小小不言的事,不必计较.

sentence.Network_en: It's been niggling at my mind ever since I met Neville in Nice.
sentence.Network_cn: 自从在尼斯见到内维尔后，我一直忐忑不安。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(93) ... niggle 拘泥小节 niggling 琐碎工作 nigh on 接近地.
以n开头的英语英文单词 ... niggardly 吝啬的，勉强的 niggling 琐碎的，费神的 nigh 在附近的.
耍赖(Niggling)到这种田产。 迎接进来瑞丰(Ruifeng)国际在线客户服务中央，咱们的在线客服职员将很快(Quickly)会与您扳谈。
niggardly adj．吝啬的，勉强的niggling adj．琐碎的，费神的nightmare n．恶梦，可怕的事

list.abs: GRE逆序_馆档网 ... straggle 迷路，漫延 niggle 挑剔，吹毛求疵 wiggle 扭动，蠕动.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(93) ... nigger-lover 黑人解放运动者 niggle 拘泥小节 niggling 琐碎工作.
小,小字的解释,查字典 ... 小溲[ urinate] 小算盘[ selfish calculations;petty niggling] 小提琴[ violin].

entry.def: A niggling injury or worry is small but bothers you over a long period of time.

example.ex: Both players have been suffering from niggling injuries.
example.tran: 两名运动员一直在忍受轻微的伤痛。

example.ex: ...a niggling worry that the cheap car is also the one that will cause endless trouble.
example.tran: 对廉价轿车会麻烦不断的一丝担忧

means.word_mean: 1. (informal terms) small and of little importance;

sentences.sentence: "our worries are lilliputian compared with those of countries that are at war"
"giving a police officer a free meal may be against the law, but it seems to be a picayune infraction"

auth_sentence.content: She had a certain impatience, especially for niggling scholars.
auth_sentence.res_content: She had a certain impatience, especially for niggling scholars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She had a certain impatience, especially for niggling scholars.

auth_sentence.content: There is this niggling little thing called evidence that has heretofore been absent.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is this niggling little thing called evidence that has heretofore been absent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is this niggling little thing called evidence that has heretofore been absent.

auth_sentence.content: The Act of Settlement had imposed many niggling...restrictions on the power of a sovereign.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Act of Settlement had imposed many niggling...restrictions on the power of a sovereign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Act of Settlement had imposed many niggling...restrictions on the power of a sovereign.

sentences.en: She still felt the same niggling doubt: was he really telling the truth?
sentences.cn: 她仍然无法消除萦绕心头的疑虑：他真的说实话了吗？
